TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SendOrPostCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SendOrPostCallback(state As Object)
type SendOrPostCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

Docs.param: The object passed to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Represents a method to be called when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> represents a callback method that you want to execute when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context. Create the delegate by passing your callback method to the <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> constructor. Your method must have the signature shown here.
